Disable Comments

Created : 2022-07-29 Updated : 2022-08-25
Previous Post : ä¸»é¢˜ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å— Next Post : newå…³é”®å­—å®ç°

Demo of how to disable comments.

To disable comments for some post, just set vssue: false in the frontmatter.

Here is the frontmatter of current demo:







Â 


---
category: demo
tags:
  - en
date: 2022-01-20
title: Disable Comments
vssue: false
---

So Vssue is disabled on this page, and no comments display below ğŸ˜‰.
